messages.content: Welcome! How can I assist you today?
Hi! I'm JacQues, your assistant. What would you like to talk about or ask?
What are the lastets news about Donald Trump?

content.result:
Here are the latest news about Donald Trump:

* Trump on Trial: Actor Stormy Daniels testifies about sex with Trump, hush money payments
* Trump on Trial: Judge in hush money case told defense attorney to stop Trump from 'audibly cursing' during Stormy Daniels' testimony
* Trump says he has no regrets about challenging 2020 election results
* Trump's Florida classified documents trial indefinitely postponed
* Judge holds Trump in contempt for 10th time, warns of jail time
* Trump will speak at the Libertarian National Convention to woo independent voters
* Trump awarded 36 million more Trump Media shares worth $1.6 billion after hitting price benchmarks
* Trump calls judge 'crooked' after facing a warning of jail time if he violates a trial gag order
* Trump compares student protests to Jan. 6, part of effort to downplay Capitol attack
* Takeaways from the start of week 2 of testimony in Trump's hush money trial
* Trump says he'll use National Guard to deport migrants, doubling down on anti-immigration rhetoric
